attributes.action: Investigate declaration of income from Second Homes, compliance with  planning permission & compliance & the Housing Act of 2004.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Would the PM assure us that MP's who rented out their second homes declared their rental income in their tax returns.

I would also like to know if MP's renting out second homes, or relatives renting "second homes" to MP's and/or Ministers had applied for and received Planning Permission to change the status of their property.  

Also, were the properties inspected and found to be compliant to be compliant with the Housing Act of 2004, to ensure that the properties met the safety standards of that Act.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
